article.title: UN layout formatting specification for UBL Invoice instances

section.title: Invoice formatting specification
section.para: This formatting specification describes a rendering of the UBL Invoice document model according to the United Nations Layout Key for Trade Documents guidelines for application for the 380 invoice form:

listitem.para: 380 Commercial Invoice: Document claiming payment for goods supplied under conditions agreed between seller and buyer.

section.para: For a list of all formatting specifications and an overview of the documentation conventions, please visit the formatting specification home page.

section.title: Status
section.para: This specification has no formal status at this time. It should not be considered a reference interpretation of UBL documents. Feedback is sought from users of stylesheets that implement this formatting specification regarding suggestions for change for consideration by the OASIS UBL committees for incorporation into these formatting specifications.

Presentational semantics may never be formalized or normative in the UBL project due to differing international requirements and conventions for the presentation of information found in business documents. This document contains only examples from a few of what will probably be many available UBL stylesheet libraries.

section.title: Layout order and information
section.para: Items in this formatting specification are ordered roughly from the laid out fields on the form in the order left-to-right, top to bottom.
Certain descriptions are verbatim quotes from the United Nations guidelines document.

Important: the rendering of a number of fields is very simplified, reflecting a Western European interpretation of a subset of fields (as in names and addresses). User requirements need to be better understood for the level of granularity in these formatting specifications.

section.title: Miscellaneous information
section.para: The following information is unrelated to the visible fields of the form.

section.title: Document header information
section.para: This information shows up in the window-title bar of the HTML browser, and in the document title supported by some XSL-FO processors.

section.title: Main document and party information
section.para: Header information is associated with the form as a whole, not to the individual items of goods.

section.title: Seller
section.para: This field is intended to show the name and address of the sender of goods or the originator of the documents, as the case may be.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Invoice number
section.para: This number is a unique number assigned to the invoice by the seller.

section.title: Invoice date (tax point)
section.para: This field states the date of the invoice for tax purposes

section.title: Seller's reference
section.para: This field provides a seller assigned reference to the order corresponding to this invoice.

section.title: Buyer's reference
section.para: This field provides the buyer's reference to the original order.

section.title: Purchase order date
section.para: This fields provides the issue date of the original order

section.title: Consignee
section.para: These fields are used to provide the name and address of the receiver of the goods involved in the transaction.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Buyer
section.para: These fields are used to provide the name and address of the buyer of the goods involved in the transaction.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Buyer bank
section.para: These fields provide the name and address of the buyer's bank.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Country of origin
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Country of destination
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Delivery and transport
section.para: Transportation fields are header-like information and are applicable to the entire order.

section.title: Mode of transport
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Date of despatch
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Means of transport
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Place of despatch
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Vessel/flight no.
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Port of loading
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Port of discharge
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Place of delivery
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Financial information
section.para: The financial information provides details of the buyer and seller account details.

section.title: Terms of payment
section.para: These fields provide information relating to the payment terms.

section.title: Currency of payment
section.para: This specifies the payment currency for the entire invoice.

section.title: Seller's bank
section.para: These fields provide the name and address of the seller's bank.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Sort code
section.para: This field contains the sort code for the seller's bank.

section.title: Account number
section.para: This field contains the seller's account number.

section.title: Account name
section.para: This field contains the seller's account name.

section.title: Consignment information
section.para: The consignment information holds generic details and totals relating to all the goods items in the invoice.

section.title: Shipping marks; container number
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the invoice.

section.title: Number and kind of packages; description of goods
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the Invoice.

section.title: Total gross weight (kg)
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the Invoice.

section.title: Total cube (m3)
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the Invoice.

section.title: Total net weight (kg)
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the Invoice.

section.title: Line item information
section.para: Line item information is associated with the individual item of goods in the invoice

section.title: Item / References
section.para: The first reference is the buyer's assigned reference to the line item.
The second reference is the seller's assigned reference to the line item.

section.title: Description
section.para: This provides a free text description of the line item.

section.title: Country of origin
section.para: This field is used to provide to country of origin for the line item.

section.title: Commodity code
section.para: This field is used to provide the commodity code for the line item.

section.title: Quantity
section.para: This fields states the number of items invoiced for the line item.

section.title: Unit price
section.para: This field is used to specify the unit price of the line item.

section.title: Amount
section.para: This field states the actual line item amount which will be quantity multiplied by the unit price, the result is not calculated it will be transmitted.

section.title: Summary information
section.para: Summary information is associated to the entire invoice and not to any individual line item.

section.title: Clauses and / or Notes
section.para: This notes field is used for any free text information that relates to the entire invoice, for specific invoice clauses or declarations.

section.title: Total amount
section.para: Two data fields populate this one form field: the currency and the total amount.
NB The total amount is the total of all the individual line items and is not calculated it will be transmitted

section.title: Total tax amount
section.para: This fields provides details of any tax associated to the entire invoice, this amount will not be calculated it will be transmitted

section.title: Total amount due
section.para: Two data fields populate this one form field: the currency and the total amount.
This fields specifies the amount to be paid and will not be calculated it will be transmitted.

section.title: Name of signatory
section.para: This fields identified the name of the signatory.

section.title: Place and date of issue
section.para: The above fields provide information relating to the date and place of issue of the invoice.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Signature
section.para: This field is not currently being filled automatically as it is a manual entry.
